description: Deletes the permissions boundary for the specified IAM role.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Removing permissions boundaries can weaken the security posture by reducing the effectiveness of policies designed to limit role actions.
Removing permissions boundaries may be used as part of exploiting a misconfiguration to gain elevated privileges.

securityImplications: Attackers might use DeleteRolePermissionsBoundary to remove restrictions and gain unauthorized access to AWS resources.
